entry.title: Acs_Colloids
entry.content: Rose presented the Victor K. LaMer Dissertation Award Lecture at ACS Colloids! To view the slides from her talk, click here.
entry.summary: Rose presented the Victor K. LaMer Dissertation Award Lecture at ACS Colloids! To view the slides from her talk, click here.

entry.title: Photonics_Nat_Comm
entry.content: Rose's work The Diversity of Three-Dimensional Photonic Crystals is published in Nature Communications!
entry.summary: Rose's work The Diversity of Three-Dimensional Photonic Crystals is published in Nature Communications!

entry.title: Lamer
entry.content: ACS Colloids names Rose the winner of the Victor K. LaMer Award for her dissertation work! She will present the award talk at their 2021 meeting on June 16th.
entry.summary: ACS Colloids names Rose the winner of the Victor K. LaMer Award for her dissertation work! She will present the award talk at their 2021 meeting on June 16th.

entry.title: Rosyaps2021
entry.content: Rose presented her work on Structure-property maps with Kernel Principal Covariates Regression and Improving Feature and Sample Selection with Principal Covariates Regression at the APS March Virtual Meeting . A recording of the talk is available online for the duration of the meeting.
entry.summary: Rose presented her work on Structure-property maps with Kernel Principal Covariates Regression and Improving Feature and Sample Selection with Principal Covariates Regression at the APS March Virtual Meeting . A recording of the talk is available online for the duration of the meeting.

entry.title: Pcovcur
entry.content: Checkout Rose's latest pre-print, Improving Sample and Feature Selection with Principal Covariates Regression on the arXiv!
entry.summary: Checkout Rose's latest pre-print, Improving Sample and Feature Selection with Principal Covariates Regression on the arXiv!

entry.title: Chemiscope
entry.content: Rose's work contributing to Structure-property maps with Kernel Principal Covariates Regression is published in the Journal for Machine Learning: Science and Technology.
entry.summary: Rose's work contributing to Structure-property maps with Kernel Principal Covariates Regression is published in the Journal for Machine Learning: Science and Technology.

entry.title: Chemiscope
entry.content: Rose's work contributing to Chemiscope, an interactive structure-property explorer, is published in the Journal of Open Source Software. The HTML version is available at chemiscope.org.
entry.summary: Rose's work contributing to Chemiscope, an interactive structure-property explorer, is published in the Journal of Open Source Software. The HTML version is available at chemiscope.org.

entry.title: React Paper
entry.content: Rose's publishes an article in the Proceedings of the American Society for Engineering Education (ASEE) detailing the REACT Workshop entitled Bringing Science Education and Research together to REACT.
entry.summary: Rose's publishes an article in the Proceedings of the American Society for Engineering Education (ASEE) detailing the REACT Workshop entitled Bringing Science Education and Research together to REACT.

entry.title: Rose Presents At Mrs
entry.content: Rose presents a poster entitled "The Diversity of 3D Photonic Crystals" at Materials Research Society (MRS) Meeting in Boston, MA and wins the award for Best Poster!
entry.summary: Rose presents a poster entitled "The Diversity of 3D Photonic Crystals" at Materials Research Society (MRS) Meeting in Boston, MA and wins the award for Best Poster!

entry.title: Rose Presents At Aiche
entry.content: Rose presents "The Diversity of 3D Photonic Crystals" at American Institute of Chemical Engineers (AIChE) Annual Meeting in Orlando, FL. Prof. Sharon Glotzer gives a talk on Rose's work, entitled "In Search of the Photonic Band Gap".
entry.summary: Rose presents "The Diversity of 3D Photonic Crystals" at American Institute of Chemical Engineers (AIChE) Annual Meeting in Orlando, FL. Prof. Sharon Glotzer gives a talk on Rose's work, entitled "In Search of the Photonic Band Gap".
